resources.string: Congratulations !!! You have successfully logged into Dropbox. This is a test application for the Mobiquity Code Challenge. The login allows the user to access the Dropbox API. This Application consists of the functionalities such as image capture,upload captured image to dropbox, display the dropbox files, upload images and audo files from gallary.

Welcome to Cloud Storage App powered by dropbox. This is a Code Challenge Test App. This App can Capture and Upload Images,audio by recording them. This App can List all the Dropbox files present. Please proceed by logging into the app by using the dropbox credentials.

Please choose from the options below to proceed. You can Record Audio Clips, Capture Image and save to native Android App. You can Select Images from the Gallery and upload to Dropbox. select "Upload To Dropbox" option after making a selection.
